name: Onco-GPS Paper Analysis
description: Shareable project for: Decomposing Oncogenic Transcriptional Signatures to Generate Maps of Divergent Cellular States
environment_history: conda install --prefix PROJECT_ENVIRONMENT_DIRECTORY_PATH --channel conda-forge --yes --quiet jupyter yapf click pandas hdf5 pytables scikit-learn scipy statsmodels matplotlib seaborn plotly pycrypto bcrypt biopython rpy2 r-mass
